suggestions.original: To improve the realism of the artwork, focus on refining the proportions and details of the figures. Study human anatomy to create more lifelike and accurately proportioned people. Pay attention to the textures and details of the butterflies, clouds, and flowers to make them appear more realistic. Consistent lighting and perspective will also enhance the overall realism. Observing real-life references and practicing shading and depth can help achieve a more lifelike depiction.
suggestions.current: Please use Egyptian frontal painting. To improve the realism of the artwork, focus on refining the proportions and details of the figures. Consistent lighting and perspective will also enhance the overall realism. Observing real-life references and practicing shading and depth can help achieve a more lifelike depiction.
